DataElement.preferredName: Person Past Month Added Sugar Intake Number
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A human being.:Before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Combined or joined to increase in size or quantity or scope._A white crystalline carbohydrate, typically sucrose, used as a sweetener and preservative._The process of taking in a substance, especially by eating or drinking, or the quantities thereof; admittance of people to a place or organization at a particular time._Number

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Person Past Month Added Sugar Intake
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A human being.:Before the present time._One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks._Combined or joined to increase in size or quantity or scope._A white crystalline carbohydrate, typically sucrose, used as a sweetener and preservative._The process of taking in a substance, especially by eating or drinking, or the quantities thereof; admittance of people to a place or organization at a particular time.

Property.preferredDefinition: Past; before the present time.:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:Combined or joined to increase in size or quantity or scope.:No Value Exists:Intake; the substances, or the quantities thereof, taken in and utilized by the body.

Concepts.definition: One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
Combined or joined to increase in size or quantity or scope.
A white crystalline carbohydrate, typically sucrose, used as a sweetener and preservative.
The process of taking in a substance, especially by eating or drinking, or the quantities thereof; admittance of people to a place or organization at a particular time.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Number; a concept of quantity derived from zero and units; a numeral or string of numerals that is used for identification.

Concepts.definition: A numeral or string of numerals expressing value, quantity, or identification.
